item.title: Wii Remote Hacks
item.description: It’d be cool to use the Wiimote and/or nunchuck as an input device to control I dunno, a drone or something? Haven’t gotten very far, but here’s some links for posterity: wiibrew - lots of in-depth info, like docs for the various protocols and data formats, esp. around the ‘mote and nunchuck hackaday category - relevant articles gobot lib - i2c for the nunchuck nunchucky from Adafruit - breakout for nunchuck and other devices (like the classic controller) to use them directly
